name: New VK fixes
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("vk.com") {
  
  /*square avatars*/
  .wall_module .reply_img,
  .post_img,
  .nim-dialog.nim-dialog_classic .nim-dialog--photo .nim-peer .nim-peer--photo .im_grid > img,
  .nim-dialog.nim-dialog_classic .nim-dialog--photo .nim-peer .nim-peer--photo > img,
  .nim-peer .nim-peer--photo-w,
  .nim-peer.nim-peer_small .im_grid > img,
  .nim-peer .nim-peer--photo .im_grid > img,
  .nim-peer .nim-peer--photo > img,
  .right_list_img,
  .search_item_img,
  .page_list_module .cell_img,
  .page_list_module .thumb,
  .module_body .people_cell_img,
  .chat_tab_img,
  a.fc_msgs_img,
  .top_profile_img,
  .ow_ava.ow_ava_small,
  .ow_ava.ow_ava_comm,
  .bp_img,
  .fans_fan_img,
  .mv_author_photo,
  .ow_ava.ow_ava_mid,
  .post_field_user_image,
  .olist_item_photo,
  .copy_post_img,
  .ts_contact_img,
  .group_row_img,
  .like_tt_image,
  .poll_tt_image,
  .friends_photo_img,
  .fans_idolph_wrap,
  .apps_feed_user_photo img,
  .apps_frtt_photo,
  .apps_i_group .apps_i_group_photo img,
  .blog_about_link_pic,
  .dev_top_profile_link img,
  .mention_tt_img,
  .mention_tt_person_img,
  .ui_ownblock_img,
  .feed_asc_user_thumb_img,
  .ui_zoom_inner,
  .mail_box_single_ava .mail_box_single_ava_img,
  .submit_post_box .thumb_off, .submit_post_box .thumb_on,
  .friends_common_img,
  .friends_import_icon, .friends_import_box_icon,
  .mention_tt_img,
  .mention_tt_person_img,
  .mail_box_single_ava .mail_box_single_ava_img,
  .feed_friend_photo_wrap .ui_zoom_inner, .feed_friend_image,
  .page_group_image,
  .im-member-item .im-member-item--photo,
  .im-member-item .im-member-item--photo img,
  .audio_page_layout .audio_owner_item .audio_owner_item__img,
  .im-prebody img
  {
    border-radius: 3px !important;
  }
  
  /*square icons*/
  .audio_page_player .audio_page_player_play .icon,
  .audio_play,
  .video_thumb_play,
  .page_video_play_icon,
  .apps_access_icon
  {
    border-radius: 3px !important;
  }
  
}
